description.narrative: This activity (Human Development Innovation Fund) is a component of Human Development Innovation Fund for Tanzania reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £38,745,307. This component benefits Tanzania, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Health policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-01-2013 and the end date is 31-07-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
